readable.title: 3147758035_e8a70818cb
readable.content: A man in black rides a bicycle across the street while another walks holding a dog . A man on a bicycle and a man on foot in a crosswalk . A man on a bike and another man with a dog in his bag crossing a wet street The man on the bike is riding next to a man holding a dog . Two men , one on a bike and one that is walking .
